content.label:
Everything about this game is beautiful.
**edit 04/16/2020**
This game has always been great, it has tested my platforming and puzzle solving skills again and again. I have been playing this game for about 7 years, and it has amazing replayability. Especially with a little easter egg they throw in at the end. You unlock a new ‚Äúlanguage‚Äù, but it actually isn‚Äôt a language. It‚Äôs all text that the game developers put in there as a joke, and let me tell you, those were some quality jokes right there! Everything from the Simpson‚Äôs reference at the beginning of the game to horribly misspelled words and grammatical errors, this new easter egg is absolutely amazing. If you haven‚Äôt gotten this game yet, please do. Not only is it super fun, but hilarious. All you gotta do is beat the game! It won‚Äôt let me put 10/5 stars...

My dad loved this game! He played when he was 20 and I played it to but some of da puzzles were tripping and kicking. And my dad has on the game he got red blue green yellow and brown and I have red green blue and brown. But 1 Q. Is there any more colors?
Best game ever!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Please *panting* please make more games can‚Äôt resist *just kidding*
Story driven, exciting, scary and lots more. One of my favorite adventure games, Hope to see more games like this in the future.

I'm still on the volcano level so don't know if there is a glitch awaiting me on the last level. Just the right amount of difficulty and I only had to check a walkthrough once so far. GREAT voice acting!  Please make more!

Please fix the yellow mechanic in the city void level. When running from the void, the electromagnets are delayed, and don't start until after you die. It's impossible to make the third jump, as the magnets just won't start.

I love this game. The visuals are amazing and it's not another puzzle game, which I'm getting tired of. It's more of a story/adventure game with challenges. And color plays an interesting part in the game. All around wonderful.
Very fun and slightly thought-provoking game...get ready for a challenge in void mode though...but the reward is worth it.....get lost in the void!
Just the best game in App Store. I played it in 2012 and i remember this game for very long. Best emotions :)
Just like SMB if you don't like a soundtrack. Description was totally inaccurate. Worst ever. This exact *thing* is why I hate buying games you can't preview.
Such an amazing game

I love this game I download it once a year and beat it then delete it about to go for forth time starting to get boring please make another one for iPhone 6 at least love it the game a lot
This game is amazing, every thing from the story to the graphic design... i only wish it was a LITTLE more challenging
I've had this game for a long time. It's still beautiful and fun to play.
The best game i ever played!! Really thanks. Wating for your next surprise:)

title.label: Excellent mix of puzzles and action

content.label:
This game very successfully combines an action platformer and a puzzle game. The graphics are beautiful.

I was almost very dissatisfied when I went through the game way too easily, but then found void mode which is very difficult.

The only real criticism I have is that the direction controls are too small and often hit the screen to draw instead of moving which was very annoying at times. Other than that it was an excellent game. One of the best I've played.
I wasted 3 DOLLARS BECAUSE THIS GAME CRAHES WHEN I CLICK FROZEN CLIFFS 1 FUX THESE CRASHES OR I WON'T PLAY!!!!!!!!!!!
This is a lovely and interesting game.  But at this point, it's crashing so often that it's ceased to be enjoyable.  Please fix so I can go on!
Deepest story I've ever seen on an iOS game ever, asking philosophical questions and couple with a pleasant gameplay, good puzzles, beautiful music and great narration. Absolutely recommended.
I love this game. Great concept.

I used to play this game hours on end and I loved-still love- it but now when I try to play volcano Vl it crashes, no matter how many times I try to play the game. I am giving this a 5 star because of how good it is but please fix the crashing

title.label: Looks like a good game but CRASHES

content.label: This game is totally my thing, I love the graphics and the voiceover. BUT, it crashes at level 4. Everything just freezes and I wasn't able to do anything except shut down the game from the system. Keeps crashing at the same point too. Please fix so I can keep playing.
Enjoying the game so far, but it keeps crashing for me on the Frozen World IV level. Using iPhone 5S. Hope a fix comes soon!

This game is amazing, I love every part of it! I ended up spending hours just playing this game, the voice over is great, the character fun, the monsters challenging, an altogether good game! I loved playing it and beating the levels, however I got to the void mode, and I started experiencing problems with the color green (bouncy) some of levels would completely freeze not allowing me to move or pause the game, sometimes this would happen with the screen transition, or when I tried to place the color at all. I hope they fix this problem soon, so I can finish this joy of a game.
Very nice game, but it is crashing on the VI volcano on my 4s.

I just barely started playing the game for the first time after the latest update. It has since frozen/crashed 8 times in less than 10 minutes. All on the first two worlds. Can this be fixed? Looks like a very promising game.
An amazing game but after the last update it crashes on my 4s at certain check point
Enjoyed this title immensely.  The regular mode satisfies the casual gamer while the unlocked void mode appeases the hardcore gamer.  Great job developers!  üòÉ

I rarely review games, but this impressed me so much I had to leave one. I never would have expected to love this game as much as I do. The story is simple but very deep, and really spoke to me. The controls are fairly easy, but switching colors quickly can get difficult towards the end. The solutions to some of the "puzzles" really make you think outside the box, especially once you get to void mode. I'm excited to see what else the developers come up with!

One of the best games I've ever played!.  It's challenging without pissing you off and the story is awesome!.  Lost a few hours of sleep past few nights... Now to decide if I want to try and compete the bonus missions once you finish the game,...
I love this game but know it keeps crashing. I don't get it.

Okay, I NEVER write reviews for apps. Like, I mean I have NEVER once written an app review. But I absolutely HAD TO for this amazing app.  It is the best game I have ever played on the App Store and it was definitely worth the money.  There were hours of gameplay and I could not put my phone down. Make sure you have your voice on while playing this game or it ruins the experience cause the voice over is EXCELLENT and perfect for this game. I'd pay $10 for this game it was that good. PLEASE buy this in the NAME OF GAMING
Best game I've played in a long time!!! Hope they come out with another version!
I loved this game, it is perfect. The art, the sound is amazing
Very good!!!
I dislike and delete all apps that default to being on. Make sounds opt in by default and maybe I'd have actually evaluated the game. Too bad you can't think of the user first before the effect.
One of the best games I have ever played, on any medium (iOS, PC, Wii, Xbox, etc.) Thank you...

title.label: I'd like it more if it didn't crash all the time.

content.label: Especially on older devices (4th generation iPod)

title.label: Could have been better, especially since one level is impossible.

content.label:
You play as a scarecrow-shaped blob from the Void who recently escaped into the real world. Throughout the game, you need to jump on platforms, press switches, push blocks, and kill Void monsters all in order to escape the Void. There is a story that appears to be some sort of bizarre social commentary. The game rants about how life is pointless and about not belonging in the world, concluding that you should commit suicide to return to where you belong.

The puzzle platforming elements were enjoyable and just the right level of difficulty, mostly. The difficulty curve rapidly increases after gaining your fourth ability. The abilities allow you to stick to walls, make the ground slippery so you and other things move faster, turn surfaces into bouncy surfaces, create fire, and connect electrical circuits. Abilities are activated by painting a color onto a surface.

Void Mode (aka New Game+) has you repeat all the levels with new and far more challenging puzzles. I had to use walkthroughs on nearly half of them.

Overall I'd say this is a good game, nothing really special, and unfortunately not well suited for mobile platform. There are many times when you need to use color, remove color, move, and jump all at once, but you can effectively only ever do two out of the four. The City level 2 in Void mode is impossible on mobile since you have to apply, remove, and reapply color in the span of half a second but it takes at least two seconds to switch between those modes.
One Of The only games with good mechanics and amazing story 5 stars because i can't give more
And i will play it

A great game!  Kudos, truly well done!  Played through both normal and void mode with absolutely no problems (iPhone 6+).  

Only issue is I got the game when it was free.  I will be looking to buy it on a different platform just so I can also up-vote with my $$.  :)
I have loved this game so far, but it keeps consistently crashing on me level 4 of the desert stage.
This game is very fun and unique. I enjoyed the gameplay and story.
